TextEng: Be gone, spirit. My presence is none of your concern.
Text: 사라져, 정령. 내가 여기 있는 건 네 알 바 아니야.

TextEng: What kind of undead creature are you?
Tell me what help you need.
May I ask you some questions?
I will be going now. Goodbye.
What have the kobolds been up to?
Where are your people from?
You deserve your fate, as I see it.
Text: 내가 보기엔, 네 운명은 당연한 거야.

TextEng: Then your masters were fools. The dark arts should have made them stronger.
Text: 그럼 네 주인들은 바보였어. 암흑 마법이 그들을 더 강하게 만들었어야지.

TextEng: Such is the price paid for consorting with evil.
That is a terrible shame.
You want to speak with me? What for?
I seek a group of kobolds who may have entered this crypt.
Text: 이 지하 묘지에 들어왔을 코볼트 무리를 찾고 있어.

TextEng: The kobolds are here? That's all I needed to know. Farewell.
Text: 코볼트들이 여기 있다고? 그것만 알면 됐어. 안녕.

TextEng: I don't need your help, spirit.
You can tell me what you want, but don't get your hopes up.
Text: 뭘 원하는지 말해도 좋지만, 기대는 하지 마.

TextEng: What do you need my help with?
I'll only do this for the right reward.
I guess you're stuck with the spiders then. Sorry.
I have no time for spider-killing. I have enough problems of my own.
Text: 거미 잡을 시간 없어. 내 일만 해도 벅차.

TextEng: I suppose so, if it will make my job easier.
No, goodbye.
I will help you.
It is none of your business, spirit.
I seek treasure.
I seek the kobolds who recently entered this crypt.
Text: 최근에 이 지하 묘지에 들어온 코볼트들을 찾고 있어.

TextEng: I should go.
I have destroyed a nest of spiders and their eggs.
This sounds complicated. Why don't I just kill the kobolds?
Text: 복잡하게 들리는데. 그냥 코볼트들을 죽이면 안 돼?

TextEng: How do I find the secret entrance?
Please, continue.
Now it is time to go slaughter some helpless kobolds.
That's it? That's all I get for killing all those spiders?
Text: 이게 다야? 그 많은 거미를 잡고 받는 게 이게 전부야?

TextEng: Just give me the reward. I have earned it.
Text: 그냥 보상이나 줘. 받을 자격이 있어.

TextEng: I am sorry. I am just tired.
That should make my job much easier. Thank you, spirit.
Text: 그러면 내 일이 훨씬 쉬워지겠네. 고마워, 정령.

TextEng: Ah, magic! Now I shall be more powerful than ever!
Text: 아, 마법! 이제 그 어느 때보다 강해지겠어!

TextEng: Great, more fighting, thanks a lot.
Text: 좋아, 싸움이 더 늘었네, 정말 고맙다.

TextEng: You are very kind, good spirit. Thank you.
The spiders and their eggs are destroyed.
I have no time for that.
Tell me what aid you need.
I will help you.
